original_text: But I will kindle a fire in the wall of Rabbah, and it shall devour the palaces thereof, with shouting in the day of battle, with a tempest in the day of the whirlwind:
korean_text: 내가 랍바 성에 불을 놓아 그 궁궐들을 사르되 전쟁의 날에 외침과 회오리바람의 날에 폭풍으로 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: But I will kindle a fire
and it shall devour the palaces thereof
with shouting in the day of battle
with a tempest in the day of whirlwind
